sqlMap.statement:
select tablekey,tableename,tablecname,flag,creator,createdate,modifier,modifydate,tabtype,memo from t03_entity_kind_man where flag !='2'
tablekey = #tablekey#
flag = #flag#
order by createdate desc
delete from T03_entity_kind_man where tablekey in ($value$)
select tablekey as id, -1 as parent_id,tablecname as name from t03_entity_kind_man where flag !='2' order by createdate desc
select count(*) from t03_entity_kind_man x where x.tableename=#value#
select * from T03_Entity_Kind_Man where tablekey in ($value$) and flag='1'

select A.column_name colename, A.data_type COLTYPE,A.data_length collength,A.data_precision numinteger, A.Data_Scale numpoint,B.comments colcname from user_tab_columns A,user_col_comments B where a.COLUMN_NAME=b.column_name and A.Table_Name = B.Table_Name and A.Table_Name = upper((select t.tableename from t03_entity_kind_man t where t.tablekey=#tablekey#))
A.column_name=upper(#colename#)
order by colename

select count(b.rtettypekey) from t03_object_copyconf b, t03_entity_kind a,t03_entity_kind_man c where c.tablekey=#tablekey# and upper(b.targetcol)=upper('$colename$') and c.tableename=a.rtetfacttable and a.rtettypekey=b.rtettypekey

select distinct a.rtettypekey tablekey,a.rtetname tablecname,a.rtetfacttable tableename from t03_object_copyconf b, t03_entity_kind a,t03_entity_kind_man c where c.tablekey=#tablekey# and upper(b.targetcol)=upper('$colename$') and c.tableename=a.rtetfacttable and a.rtettypekey=b.rtettypekey
